is_longer_than: {property} must be longer than or equal to {constraints} characters
is_shorter_than: {property} must be shorter than or equal to {constraints} characters
is_less_than: {property} must be less than or equal to {constraints}
is_greater_than: {property} must be greater than or equal to {constraints}
is_enum: {property} must be a valid enum value
is_number: {property} must be a number conforming to the specified constraints
is_in_array: {property} must be one of the following values: {constraints}
each_is_in_array: Each value in {property} must be one of the following values: {constraints}
string_length: {property} must be between {constraints.0} and {constraints.1} in length
is_defined: {property} should not be null or undefined
array_max_size: {property} must contain not more than {constraints} elements
is_longitude: {property} must be a longitude string or number
is_latitude: {property} must be a latitude string or number
min: {property} must be greater than or equal to {constraints}
max: {property} must be less than or equal to {constraints}
